title: LET'S GET THE SURRENDERING OPTION REMOVED IN RANKED...
body:
SURRENDERING IN RANKED? 

ARE YOU SERIOUS?

HOW DO YOU CLIMB THE LADDER WHEN EVERYONE CONSTANTLY QUITS THE GAME IN APATHY?

People who surrender certainly don't care about getting ahead in ranked...

Why do we need those people contaminating the ranked games for the rest of us?

Why have ranked at all if you are going to have the surrender option?
